mapper.select: select invitation_code invitationCode, next_level_invitation_code nextLevelInvitationCode from invite_relationship_info where under_next_level_invitation_code = #{invitationCode}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO invite_relationship_info (invitation_code, next_level_invitation_code, under_next_level_invitation_code, create_time, modify_time) VALUES (#{invitationCode}, #{nextLevelInvitationCode}, #{underNextLevelInvitationCode}, #{createTime}, #{modifyTime});
